net.kuujo.vertigo.rpc

Interface StreamExecutor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component<StreamExecutor>, Executor<StreamExecutor>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultStreamExecutor

    public interface StreamExecutor
extends Executor<StreamExecutor>
    A stream executor. The stream executor is designed to integrate with Vert.x ReadStream APIs by mimicking the WriteStream interface.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

      • execute

        String execute(org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject args,
             org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<JsonMessage>> resultHandler)
        Executes the network.
        Parameters:
        args - Execution arguments.
        resultHandler - An asynchronous result handler to be invoke with the execution result.
        Returns:
        The emitted message correlation identifier.

      • execute

        String execute(org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject args,
             String tag,
             org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<JsonMessage>> resultHandler)
        Executes the network.
        Parameters:
        args - Execution arguments.
        tag - A tag to apply to the arguments.
        resultHandler - An asynchronous result handler to be invoke with the execution result.
        Returns:
        The emitted message correlation identifier.

      • drainHandler

        StreamExecutor drainHandler(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<Void> handler)
        Sets a drain handler on the executor. The drain handler will be called when the execute queue is available to receive new messages.
        Parameters:
        handler - A handler to be invoked when a full execute queue is emptied.
        Returns:
        The called executor instance.
